name: Ranma - Ranma 1/2 | LoRA
description:
Here's Ranma partly requested by my wife, I experimented with activation tags and mixing the concepts so it might have some bleeding. I had a Shampoo too, but someone got ahead on that department, get her here. I might share mine anyways in the future, cause she's kawaii. There's another Ranma-chan more fanarty, so pay them a visit too.

They come in two flavors: 1boy,oyu will give you male Ranmas; while 1girl,mizu will give female Ranmas. Otherwise, the model knows the top part of the outfit well which can be gotten with chinese clothes but not so much the pants because I couldn't find that many full body pictures, same for the shoes. Male Ranma tends to have blue eyes like the female version, so just adjust that accordingly. I'll separate the concepts for a version two.

Also, very important, the AI has trouble with the braid sometimes as it's thin and short. single braid helps sometimes but some others not, so it might need a few tries.


All the example pictures should have prompts. Please leave reviews with pictures, I want to see what you make!

I'll probably keep making more characters and other kinds of LoRAs, if you want to support me, you can go to my wife's DA where she has a subscription and is the same as me having a kofi or similar and you get some nice sexy pictures on return.

modelVersions.description:
It's the same.

Changed the activation tags so they don't make unintended water. Tried to make female hold less things.
